channel.title: tranquilpeak on Data science portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in tranquilpeak on Data science portfolio

item.title: Project 1: Analysis of chess games
item.description:
• Condensed and enriched the raw data found in the lichess website
  • Created a publicly available new dataset with all the new features
  • Analysed the popularity of different openings accross rating as well as their success rate for White and Black
  • Investigated the relationship between Elo rating and the occurance of inaccurate moves
  • Predicted the game outcome using Random Forests (R ranger package)
